word_mean: 电极：导电体和电流送达部位之间的中介
在电疗中为一带有输送电流的足或面的器材，把电流引入病人身体或另一器材
在电诊断上为针板或金属板，用以激起或记录组织的电活动
熔焊时用以传导电流，并使填充材料和母材熔化或本身亦作为填充材料而熔化的金属丝(焊丝，焊条)、棒(石墨棒，钨棒)。

sentence.Network_en: Each half reaction responds to the interfacial potential at the corresponding electrode.
sentence.Network_cn: 每个半反应都与相应电极上的界面电势差相呼应.

sentence.Network_en: In this case, a flow of electrons from electrode to solution occurs.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样, 就发生从电极到溶液的电子流动.

sentence.Network_en: The calomel electrode has a small pinhole opening or wick.
sentence.Network_cn: 甘汞电板上有一个针孔或砂芯.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from electric + Greek hodos 'way', on the pattern of anode and cathode

entry.def: An electrode is a small piece of metal or other substance that is used to take an electric current to or from a source of power, a piece of equipment, or a living body.

example.ex: The patient's brain activity is monitored via electrodes taped to the skull.
example.tran: 病人的大脑活动通过固定在其头骨上的电极进行监控。

means.word_mean: 1. a conductor used to make electrical contact with some part of a circuit

auth_sentence.content: Experience in electrode design and membrane design will be appreciated.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Experience in electrode design and membrane design will be appreciated.

auth_sentence.content: Instead it lays an artifical cell membrane atop a gold electrode.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Instead it lays an artifical cell membrane atop a gold electrode.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表示"电" 注:electr的原义是琥珀,现指由于磨擦琥珀而产生的电

stems_affixes.value_cn: 电的, 导电的, 电动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: electr电+ic……的→adj.电的, 导电的, 电动的
electric电的, 导电的+al..的→adj.电的, 有关电的
electr电+on物理上一些名词→n.电子

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使充电,使通电;使电气化
stems_affixes.word_buile: electr电+ify……化→v.使充电,使通电;使电气化

sentences.en: A voltage is then applied across the cell electrodes.
sentences.cn: 然后给电池的正负电极施加电压。
